summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of Oregon Street from Rainier Avenue to 38th Avenue South; and certain other streets and avenues, by paving and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 15656 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
